name: Griffith
description: Griffith is the current leader of the reborn Band of the Falcon and supreme commander of the Midland Regular Army. Having been at the fore of many battles, he has amassed a reputation as a savior across the continent, and is revered as the 'Falcon of Light'.

name: Guts
affiliation: Band of the Falcon/Black Swordsman group
description: Guts, renowned as the 'Black Swordsman', is a former mercenary and branded wanderer who travels the world in a constant internal struggle between pursuing his own ends and upholding his attachments to those dear to him.

name: Casca
affiliation: Band of the Falcon/Black Swordsman group
description: Casca is a former unit commander of the Band of the Falcon and an estranged companion of Guts.

name: Puck
description: Puck is an elf of the Pisky race, descendants of the ancient spirits of wind. A former denizen of Elfhelm, the idyllic elven realm of the Flower Storm Monarch, he left out of sheer boredom and became Guts' first newfound companion since.
